# .gitignore

* Primary goal is to minimize clutter from reaching source control
* Additionally, want to protect source control from generated files

```
# ~~~ Folders ~~~
# VS Code data
/.vscode

# MyPy
/.mypy_cache

# Data folder
/data

# Models
/models

# ~~~ Files ~~~
# Compiled python modules
*.pyc

# Log files
*.log

# sql files
*.sqlite
```
